reviewText: How to describe the almost indescribable? Beautiful colors, mesmerizing music.  I absolutely love "Balloons" - Such an intensely beautiful use of color.  I get happy watching it. You really need to see it!

Yes, Baba Baby, you're right. Laseresque colors and patterns accompany great music to create a totally entertaining experience. This beats anything on TV. Johnny Young has something here. Well worth it.
This is really nice ! really cool and relaxing images for so many different occasions and uses - well done Johnny !

Just received my copy of 'Cosmation'... manoman what a TRIP!!!  Fantastic voyage of eye and ear candy...what an adventure!... taking this journey replaces the experience of getting stoned...and it's LEGAL!!!  Thank you John Young...you did good...really really good!
